name: balloon
author: AFNI Developers
description: Simulation of haemodynamic response using the balloon model. Based on the theoretical model proposed by Buxton et al. (1998).

inputs.description: Scan repetition time in seconds (TR), the interval at which the output curve will be sampled.
inputs.name: Repetition Time

inputs.description: Number of scans (N), the output curve will comprise this number of samples.
inputs.name: Number of Scans

inputs.description: The name of a file containing the event timings, in seconds, as ASCII strings separated by white space, with time 0 being the time at which the initial scan occurred.
inputs.name: Event Times File

inputs.description: Haemodynamic rise time in seconds (typically between 4s and 6s).
inputs.name: Haemodynamic Rise Time

inputs.description: Haemodynamic sustain time in seconds (typically between 0s and 4s).
inputs.name: Haemodynamic Sustain Time

inputs.description: Haemodynamic fall time in seconds (typically between 4s and 6s).
inputs.name: Haemodynamic Fall Time
